Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Дух машины. Берет на себя значительную часть работы по тактическом планированию, управлению сенсорикой, работе со связью и микроконтролю миомерных мышц. Крутащиеся шестиренки когитатора радуют пилота и увеличивают храбрость и свирепость. Хотя возможно, дело в распыляемых через систему жизнеобеспечения боевых наркотиках
Localization.CULTURE_RU_RU: Дух машины. Берет на себя значительную часть работы по тактическом планированию, управлению сенсорикой, работе со связью и микроконтролю миомерных мышц. Крутащиеся шестиренки когитатора радуют пилота и увеличивают храбрость и свирепость. Хотя возможно, дело в распыляемых через систему жизнеобеспечения боевых наркотиках

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Позволяет двигаться после стрельбы, если движений в этом ходу не было.
Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Позволяет двигаться после стрельбы, если движений в этом ходу не было.
Localization.CULTURE_RU_RU: Позволяет двигаться после стрельбы, если движений в этом ходу не было.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: PASSIVE: COVER and GUARDED states both provide 40% damage reduction rather than 20% damage reduction. COVER and GUARDED together provide 60% damage reduction.
Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: PASSIVE: COVER and GUARDED states both provide 40% damage reduction rather than 20% damage reduction. COVER and GUARDED together provide 60% damage reduction.
Localization.CULTURE_RU_RU: PASSIVE: COVER and GUARDED states both provide 40% damage reduction rather than 20% damage reduction. COVER and GUARDED together provide 60% damage reduction.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Provides a [AMT] bonus to actions that generate Morale.
Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Provides a [AMT] bonus to actions that generate Morale.
Localization.CULTURE_RU_RU: Provides a [AMT] bonus to actions that generate Morale.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Friendly units within an ECM field gain +[AMT] Difficulty to missile attacks against them and immunity to Indirect Fire. Being Sensor Locked removes this effect.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US:
Units within an ECM field gain a Stealth Charge�and cannot be targeted.

Firing a weapon, using an activated ability, or an enemy penetrating the ECM field removes a Stealth Charge. Being Sensor Locked removes all Stealth Charges.

Units within an ECM field gain a Stealth Charge�and cannot be targeted.

Units within an ECM field gain a Stealth Charge�and cannot be targeted.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US:
PASSIVE: The ECM carrier projects an ECM field, building Stealth Charges for itself and allies if it starts or ends its turn with no active enemy units within the field.

ECM carriers also receive a bonus Stealth Charge.
Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE:
PASSIVE: The ECM carrier projects an ECM field, building Stealth Charges for itself and allies if it starts or ends its turn with no active enemy units within the field.

ECM carriers also receive a bonus Stealth Charge.
Localization.CULTURE_RU_RU:
PASSIVE: The ECM carrier projects an ECM field, building Stealth Charges for itself and allies if it starts or ends its turn with no active enemy units within the field.

ECM carriers also receive a bonus Stealth Charge.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: This unit is spotting against an enemy ECM field, reducing Stealth Charges by 1 each round for all visible enemies within the field.
Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: This unit is spotting against an enemy ECM field, reducing Stealth Charges by 1 each round for all visible enemies within the field.
Localization.CULTURE_RU_RU: This unit is spotting against an enemy ECM field, reducing Stealth Charges by 1 each round for all visible enemies within the field.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius, as indicated by the spinning gold ring. Will go into cooldown state after use.
Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius, as indicated by the spinning gold ring. Will go into cooldown state after use.
Localization.CULTURE_RU_RU: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius, as indicated by the spinning gold ring. Will go into cooldown state after use.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Баллистический шок, тепловая волна волна от взрыва, презагрузка БЦВМ из-за электромагнитной волны, перспектива лучевой болезни пугают пилота. Потеря инициативы [AMT] на один ход.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Myomer Accelerator Signal Circuitry Inner Sphere Assault
Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Myomer Accelerator Signal Circuitry Inner Sphere Assault
Localization.CULTURE_RU_RU: Myomer Accelerator Signal Circuitry Inner Sphere Assault

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US:
Prototype Electronic Warfare component. Adds an ECM field that provides a passive defence against missiles and immunity to indirect fire. Friendly units in the ECM field also gain Stealth Charges and cannot be targeted by direct fire unless spotted by enemy units within the ECM field or sensor locked. The ECM carrier gains an additional Stealth Charge.

The EW Suite also adds the Active Probe ability to unit's weapons panel. Active Probe is a triggered ability that uses the firing action and performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within range. Note: you can only equip one Prototype component on most Mechs.
Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE:
Prototype Electronic Warfare component. Adds an ECM field that provides a passive defence against missiles and immunity to indirect fire. Friendly units in the ECM field also gain Stealth Charges and cannot be targeted by direct fire unless spotted by enemy units within the ECM field or sensor locked. The ECM carrier gains an additional Stealth Charge.

The EW Suite also adds the Active Probe ability to unit's weapons panel. Active Probe is a triggered ability that uses the firing action and performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within range. Note: you can only equip one Prototype component on most Mechs.
Localization.CULTURE_RU_RU:
Prototype Electronic Warfare component. Adds an ECM field that provides a passive defence against missiles and immunity to indirect fire. Friendly units in the ECM field also gain Stealth Charges and cannot be targeted by direct fire unless spotted by enemy units within the ECM field or sensor locked. The ECM carrier gains an additional Stealth Charge.

The EW Suite also adds the Active Probe ability to unit's weapons panel. Active Probe is a triggered ability that uses the firing action and performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within range. Note: you can only equip one Prototype component on most Mechs.
